Prologue [ALY]38-aly [I]0-emmett tried to see what [others]186-others saw in [him]38-aly . [I]0-emmett ’m sure the height hit [them]186-others first . Six feet and two inches of pure athletic muscle was bound to grab attention . [I]0-emmett got that . [I]0-emmett got that the stupid thing [he]38-aly did with [his]38-aly hair made all [the girls]187-the girls and even [teachers]188-teachers swoon . Of course , [I]0-emmett was n’t convinced [he]38-aly did n’t know exactly what [he]38-aly was doing there . [I]0-emmett mean who honestly ran both hands slooowly through [their]186-others hair in the middle of talking to [someone]189-someone ? It was ridiculously sensual – especially when it always left [his]38-aly hair so perfectly tousled , like [he]38-aly ’d just rolled out of bed . Then there was [his]38-aly voice . Low and kind of gravelly . The dark hair , light eyes combo – that was a thing too . [I]0-emmett got that . But [I]0-emmett just could n’t get past what a prick [the kid]190-the kid was . [[Our]191-our dads]192-our dads were [best friends]193-best friends , and having grown up with [Emmett Hoult]1603-emmett , [I]0-emmett could n’t see the appeal that [everyone]194-everyone saw . All [I]0-emmett could see was what [they]194-everyone could n’t . When [the world]195-the world looked at [Emmett]1603-emmett , [they]194-everyone saw confident , devilish , sexy . [I]0-emmett saw cocky , spoiled , arrogant . [[Your]196-your typical all - American jock]197-your typical all - american jock . [I]0-emmett saw [the kid who got away with literally everything]190-the kid , no matter who [I]0-emmett complained to . [Teachers]188-teachers , [coaches]199-coaches , even [the school principal]200-the school principal looked at [me]0-emmett as a nuisance . A thorn in [their]199-coaches side . [[His]1603-emmett teammates]205-his teammates snickered at [me]0-emmett in [the halls]206-the halls . [Evie]43-evie and [I]0-emmett had poured every last penny of [our]241-we savings into buying the dead company from [Dad]42-dad , and as a seasonal business in its very first year , [I]0-emmett had a lot to prove in just a few months ’ time . That [we]241-we did , because on top of a surprise fire this week , [I]0-emmett also had nearly a lifetime of insomnia working against [me]0-emmett . [I]0-emmett had n’t slept more than three hours a night for two months now , and while [I]0-emmett was generally happy to run on fumes , tomorrow was a different story . Tomorrow , [I]0-emmett had to be functional and easy on the eyes since [I]0-emmett had [Hamptons frickin]47-the hamptons ’ Magazine coming to do a feature on the café . According to [Evie]43-evie , [I]0-emmett needed to let [them]242-them photograph [my]0-emmett “ pretty lil ’ face ”[43-evie] in order to personalize [our]241-we brand .
